DOC.brief_summary: The purposes of this study are: 1. To confirm safety of Indacaterol in stable Heart Failure. 2. To determine whether beta 2 alveolar receptor stimulation by Indacaterol is able to ameliorate lung diffusion in heart Failure patients treated with beta blockers. 3. To compare the effects of Indacaterol in patients treated with a non-selective beta blocker (Carvedilol) and a beta 1-selective beta blocker (Bisoprolol).
DOC.brief_title: Indacaterol in Heart Failure Patients: Any Role on Lung Fluid Regulation
